text: Sabine Weiss ( Weber; 23 July 1924 â€“ 28 December 2021) was a Swiss-French photographer. Her best known works were about the French humanist photography movement. Weiss was represented by Agence Rapho. Weiss died on 28 December 2021, at the age of 97. ==References== Category:1924 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Swiss photographers Category:French photographers Category:Monthey District Category:People from Valais Category:20th-century artists Category:21st-century artists
